sectiondef.header: instruction cache control register related definition
data cache control register related definition

detaileddescription.para: the locked data cache can be flushed
the locked data cache cannot be flushed

briefdescription.para: check whether instruction cache is available, 0 for not available, >0 for available
check whether data cache is available, 0 for not available, >0 for available
flush the specific data cache line
lock the specific data cache line
lock multi lines in instruction cache

simplesect.para: 0, succeeded, -1, failed (cache already locked or other reasons)

parameterdescription.para: cache tag to write (tag+lock bit+valid bit)
cache tag to read (tag+index+lock bit+valid bit)

briefdescription.para: flush multi lines in data cache
lock multi lines in data cache
